programme.title: Queen of the Night
programme.desc: Kartal is an orphan who is raised by Aziz the man who killed his father. Kartal married Aziz's daughter Esra but falls to Selin and feels obligated to leaves her.

programme.desc: Kartal is an orphan who is raised by Aziz the man who killed his father. Kartal married Aziz's daughter Esra but falls to Selin and feels obligated to leaves her.

programme.title: A Part of Me
programme.desc: Defne and Kahraman Yorukhan are rich but have no children. Their family rebukes make Deffe look for an alternative way to give her husband a heir. She decides to hire a surrogate mother to take the baby for her. Her choice falls on Elf, a young woman from the birthplace of Kahraman Antakya.

programme.title: Queen of the Night
programme.desc: Kartal is an orphan who is raised by Aziz the man who killed his father. Kartal married Aziz's daughter Esra but falls to Selin and feels obligated to leaves her.

programme.title: Endless Love
programme.desc: Turkish romantic drama series centering on a tempestuous relationship between two young individuals, whose contrasting backgrounds will have a huge impact on their future together. In a quiet, seaside neighbourhood on the outskirts of the Turkish capital, Istanbul, a young man and a young women from wholly different worlds fall in love. Their passion and love will test the patience of their families, with one of their families desperate to hide a dark secret. The series was a huge success in Turkey and is comprised of two seasons, featuring acclaimed performances from Burak Özçivit, Neslihan Atagül, and Kaan Urgancıoğlu.

programme.title: Brave and Beautiful
programme.desc: Cesur returns to his father's village with an elaborate plan to avenge the death of his father. The only thing he hadn't planned for is Suhan, the daughter of the man he believes is responsible for his father's murder.

programme.title: Ezel
programme.desc: Ömer, a young man returning from military service, is set up by his friends and fiancé and ends up in prison for ten years. He fakes his own death and manages to escape. He re-creates himself as 'Ezel', a high-end gambler who is outwardly a successful man, but inwardly driven by one thing – his determination to understand why the people he loved betrayed him, and take his revenge.

programme.title: Swallow Storm
programme.desc: The famous adaptation of the world famous movie Love and Pride.

programme.title: Life is Good When You Are in Love
programme.desc: Two brothers fall in love with a girl from a village who does not believe in love.
